title: Foundation Year Law/nWhere do I stand now?
description: The purpose of this diagnostic is for you to critically reflect on where you stand in terms of your readiness for study in terms of:
Academic skills - things to do with note-taking, essay writing, and personal organisation.
Personal skills - things to do with how you cope with difficulties and challenges.
Employability - things to do with your knowledge about careers in the law and the development of skills to secure graduate employment.
Please answer these questions, depending on your responses we can highlight, even at an early stage, the places where you could receive help and support.

title: MKT4024
description: This module is about finding out about you and developing your brand.
On completion of this assignment, you will be able to demonstrate your ability to:
·     Recognise and apply transferrable skills that are essential to a career in business
·     Use key software applications that are commonly used in the workplace
·     Demonstrate behaviours and attributes to improve their graduate employability
·     Create a personal development plan to enhance their academic and professional performance

title: ODP 4020 (external students & Apprentices)
description: This is a playlist for the external students studying to be ODP technicians and for apprentices.
To get your bronze badge you need to do all 12 activities.
The activities have been chosen to be accessible without being on site.

title: PI - Potentially Profile (ODP External)
description: At Graduate+ we have a passion for personality, everyone is unique, and we all have our own identity, let’s unlock yours with Potential.ly, a strength-based personality indicator!
Potential.ly is an online platform which is designed to help you gain a deeper insight into why you do what you do, it’s a lot deeper than being labelled an introvert or extrovert.
The profile takes only 15 minutes to complete, you’ll answer a series of short questions, and in doing this you’ll be presented with a unique PDF report of your personality and traits.

title: Building resilience (ACC4032)
description: Career and Balance Coach Clara Wilcox will take you through the steps to build and maintain your confidence, even when times are challenging. This workshop will include: the importance of a growth mindset, identifying the learning curve and how this links to your confidence, and resilience: how to create ‘bouncebackability.
Watch this﻿ video below and comment on what you have learnt in the text box below.
